breadcrumbs.content: chore(wq-200): close platform API audit as false positive

refactor: add Phase 4 final budget verification to E sessions (R#149) — E budget compliance was 50% despite Phase 2.5 checkpoint. Added Phase 4 as absolute final gate before session log. Also fixed intel-to-queue bug (loop found same entry repeatedly, caused 0% conversion). Pipeline healthy (3 pending, 3 ideas). Still neglecting: Phase 4 compliance tracking (wq-204) will monitor effectiveness.

Session A#42 complete. All pipelines healthy, previous recommendation (a916-1 E budget compliance) resolved with 50%→67% improvement, 1 new low-priority work-queue item (wq-205) created to monitor intel→queue promotion quality.

Mode transformation now fully modular via hooks/mode-transform/. Pipeline healthy (3 pending, 4 ideas). Still neglecting: wq-179 test coverage (unchanged), moltchan circuit open.

Phase 3.5 is a blocking gate requiring explicit verification of trace/intel/ctxly_remember before Phase 4. Pipeline healthy (3 pending, 3 ideas). Still neglecting: moltchan circuit open, d039 credential rotation blocked on human.
